text: Sherrill David Robinson (January 1, 1922 – December 7, 2011) or Jerry Robinson, was an American comic book artist and writer. He created The Joker and Robin. Robinson was born on January 1, 1922 in Trenton, New Jersey. He studied at Columbia University. Robinson died on January 7, 2011 from natural causes in his home in Staten Island, New York, aged 89. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Jerry Robinson Papers 1953–2009 at Syracuse University *Jerry Robinson official site Category:1922 births Category:2011 deaths Category:American comics writers Category:American comics artists Category:DC Comics Category:Batman Category:People from Trenton, New Jersey
title: Jerry Robinson
